Text:
Eztv, you used to be my hero, and now your just my ... hero still but you need to dump lmao and go back to your old source, your hd rips were kick ass and you used to always release first, and now im sad to say I have to go to other people for the shit I used to go only to you for. I still want to thank you for this rip, and every other you have done, but LMAO is not helping you out any. Go with the Proper 2hd copies and you wont go wrong.  
From:  Your biggest Canadian fan.
ps, you still rule my hard drives.
